title.value: Изучение вопроса серологической превалентности диких кабанов, отстрелянных на территории Украины, к цирковирусу свиней 2-го типа
Study on question of serological prevalence of wild boars hunted on the territory of Ukraine to Porcine circovirus type 2

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Sityuk, N.P., Ukranian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kiev (Ukraine). Institute of Veterinary Medicine
Krasochko, P.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine
Nichik,S.A., Ukranian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Kiev (Ukraine). Institute of Veterinary Medicine
Erokhovets, N.F., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine
Shchurko, V.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented data on the detection of specific humoral antibodies against Porcine circovirus type 2 in serum of wild boar hunted in different regions of Ukraine in period from 2001 till 2010. Seroprevalence dynamics of wild pigs to Porcine circovirus type 2 was shown in terms of the hunting season for wild boar. The presented results of serological monitoring of wild boars in Ukraine indicate the presence of specific antibodies against circovirus type 2 in serum. The overall percentage of positive samples of blood serum is studied among 65.2%. Annual identification of seropositive wild boars to circovirus type 2 shows the circulation of the pathogen in their population.
